name: PrintOnWeb server (AGPL)
short_description:
Print documents (MS/Libreo office documents, pdf or webpage) on mobile device, 
computer, tablet with http server on LAN network. 
Driver or software is not needed. User connect to 
printonweb (httpserver) raspberry PI (computer) server via web browser and 
uploads documents or paste URL links to printonweb server page. 
Http server interact with printer and print received documents on paper.
This application is on start-up stage: 
You assume total responsibility and risk for your use of this Service; 
use at your own risk. Read AGPL licence for more information.
summary: PrintOnWeb php server for printing documnets on web user interface.
